Name: Image.Sharpen
Desc: Sharpens the image using an unsharp mask technique.
LongDesc: The Sharpen method enhances image details by applying an unsharp mask algorithm. It supports configurable amount, radius, threshold, and detail level for fine-tuned sharpening. Useful for improving clarity and edge definition in photos and graphics.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Sharpen({ amount: 1.5, radius: 2 }); });
